name: WA-Web - Dark Skin [with more fixes] v17.05.04
description: Original skin by "skinfactory" was tweaked by "Iisakki Kaaretkoski", I added some fixes to the style and added some missing classes.
additional_info: v17.05.04 Fix: -after log in screen background -name color -contacts background -removed gif background -contact info underline and media border -group admin options hover v17.03.28 Fix: -fix intro screen background v17.02.08 Fix: -crop the intro image to circle v17.02.02 Fix: -removed all external links v17.02.01 Fix: -Search Emoji bar color -Emoji menu tabs icons colors v17.01.22 Fix: -contact name color in contact message box -link preview background color v16.12.14 Fix: -invalid media text color -attached document message -change add media button colors (in attach images) v16.12.13 Now Support GIF Fixes: -icon selector inverse colors -media view buttons colors -group info cards background v16.11.14 fix icons brightness/color v16.11.11 Updates: -Groups in common -Group participants -Contact info font color v16.11.10 -Fix audio msg and icon size -Fix link attachment colors v16.11.08 Image view window: -Arrow colors -Text color
